description: Almost four months have passed since Russia invaded Ukraine. If recent predictions from Ukraine's intelligence services are to be believed, the Russian military is under orders to maintain the offensive for another four months. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Putin, Peter the Great and prospects of a prolonged Ukraine war
title_page: Putin, Peter the Great and prospects of a prolonged Ukraine war | The Straits Times
maintext:
Almost four months have passed since Russia invaded Ukraine. If recent predictions from Ukraine's intelligence services are to be believed, the Russian military is under orders to maintain the offensive for another four months.
Not that this is not preventing some European leaders from trying to stop the fighting. French President Emmanuel Macron is embarking today on a fact-finding tour of Ukraine's immediate southern neighbours.
